title: Independent Venue Week
body:
Hi, and kicking off tonight in London with the Archie Bronson Outfit, it's a nation-wide week of live gigs to celebrate the halls, pubs and clubs that make up our live music scene.  Without this network of gigs and their promoters, we'd have never got off the ground.  Go check out a band you've heard of at a venue near you!  See you there -

Independent Venue Week Tuesday 28th January LONDON - Half Moon Putney - £5 ADV, £7 Door - Doors 7pm ARCHIE BRONSON OUTFIT www.facebook.com/ArchieBronsonOutfit THE AMAZING SNAKEHEADS www.facebook.com/theamazingsnakeheads GLASGOW - King Tuts Wah Wah Hut - £6 advance - 8.30pm LEMON PARTY https://www.facebook.com/Lemonpartytheband NEON WALTZ https://www.facebook.com/neonwaltz THE NEW FABIAN SOCIETY https://www.facebook.com/tnfsociety BLUE HONEY NORWICH - Norwich Arts Centre - £5, Age 18+ - 8pm THE SOFT www.facebook.com/thesoftmusic MAMMAL HANDS www.facebook.com/MammalHands UNIX www.facebook.com/unixmusic THE BOY WITH TWO HEADS www.facebook.com/theboywithtwoheads PLUS - SHhhh / TROPICO Deejays in the Bar

Wednesday 29th January STOKE - The Sugarmill - £5, Age 14+ - 6.30pm CAMP STAG https://www.facebook.com/CAMPSTAG THE RUBY DUKES https://www.facebook.com/TheRubyDukes NOTHING BUT THIEVES https://www.facebook.com/NothingButThieves MORAL PANICS https://www.facebook.com/moralpanicsband DELAMERE https://www.facebook.com/DelamereMusic CARDIFF - Clwb Ifor Bach - £5 - 8pm THE CONTINENTS www.facebook.com/Continentsband OCEANS APART THIS CONCEPT Thursday 30th January BRISTOL - The Louisiana - £5 ADV / £6 On the door - 7.30pm THREE KINGS HIGH www.facebook.com/THREEKINGSHIGH SMALL ENGINE REPAIR www.facebook.com/smallenginerepair WYYNONA RYYDER // www.facebook.com/WyynonaRyyder LIONFACE // www.facebook.com/lionfacemusic KAYLA PAINTER // www.facebook.com/kaylapaintermusicuk THE CRISIS PROJECT // www.facebook.com/TheCrisisProject LIVERPOOL - The Zanzibar - £4, Age 18+ - 7.15pm THE RED SUNS https://soundcloud.com/the-red-suns GO FIASCO www.facebook.com/GoFiasco THE CHEAP THRILLS www.facebook.com/TheCheapThrills DOMINIC DUNN www.facebook.com/Dominic.Dunn22 LIBERTY VESSELS www.facebook.com/pages/The-Liberty-Vessels BELFAST - Oh Yeah Centre - £5 Over 18s. - Late show 9pm LITTLE BEAR www.facebook.com/LittleBear GO WOLF www.facebook.com/LOVEGOWOLF THE COUTH www.facebook.com/couthmusic Friday 31st January SOUTHAMPTON - The Joiners Arms - £6 Adv, Age 18+ - 7.30pm THE RISING www.facebook.com/The-Rising FEVER www.facebook.com/thebandfever BEN GODDARD www.facebook.com/bengoddardmusic THE OUTLOOKS www.facebook.com/theoutlooks GUILDFORD - The Boileroom - Free, 14+ - The Library - £5, £6 on door, 18+ - 8pm - 11.30pm ALLUSONDRUGS www.facebook.com/allusondrugs FOREVER CULT www.facebook.com/forevercult FIZZLER www.facebook.com/fizzlermusic PERFECT CRIME www.facebook.com/perfectcrimesuk Saturday 1st February OXFORD -
